src.mcp.tools package

Submodules

src.mcp.tools.generation_tools module

src.mcp.tools.generation_tools.generate_answer(context: List[str], query: str, language: str = 'en') → Dict[str, Any][source]

Generates an answer based on the provided context and query.

Parameters:

  • context – List of context strings (document contents).

  • query – The user query.

  • language – The target language for the answer.

Returns:

Dictionary containing the generated answer.

src.mcp.tools.generation_tools.summarize_results(documents: List[str], language: str = 'en') → Dict[str, Any][source]

Summarizes a list of documents.

Parameters:

  • documents – List of document contents to summarize.

  • language – Target language.

Returns:

Dictionary containing the summary.

src.mcp.tools.generation_tools.translate_answer(answer: str, target_language: str) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Translates an answer to the target language.

Parameters:

  • answer – The text to translate.

  • target_language – The target language code.

Returns:

Dictionary containing the translated text.

src.mcp.tools.kg_tools module

src.mcp.tools.kg_tools.find_related_documents(document_id: str) → List[Dict[str, Any]][source]

Finds documents related to the given document ID via the Knowledge Graph.

Parameters:

document_id – The ID of the source document.

Returns:

List of related documents.

src.mcp.tools.kg_tools.get_entity_context(entity: str, entity_type: str = 'Concept') → Dict[str, Any][source]

Retrieves context and definition for a specific entity.

Parameters:

  • entity – The entity name.

  • entity_type – The type of entity (Person, Concept, Location, etc.).

Returns:

Dictionary containing entity details.

src.mcp.tools.kg_tools.query_knowledge_graph(query: str, language: str = 'en') → List[Dict[str, Any]][source]

Executes a Cypher query or natural language query against the Knowledge Graph.

Parameters:

  • query – The query string (NL or Cypher).

  • language – The language of the query.

Returns:

List of graph entities or relationships.

src.mcp.tools.language_tools module

src.mcp.tools.language_tools.detect_language(query: str) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Detects the language of the given query.

Parameters:

query – The input text to analyze.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the detected language code, name, and confidence score.

src.mcp.tools.language_tools.get_supported_languages() → List[Dict[str, str]][source]

Returns a list of supported languages.

Returns:

A list of dictionaries with language code and name.

src.mcp.tools.language_tools.preprocess_text(text: str, language: str = 'en') → Dict[str, Any][source]

Preprocesses the text based on the specified language.

Parameters:

  • text – The input text to preprocess.

  • language – The language code (e.g., ‘hi’, ‘en’).

Returns:

A dictionary containing the normalized text and tokens.

src.mcp.tools.pipeline_tools.execute_rag_pipeline(query: str, config: Dict[str, Any]) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Executes the full RAG pipeline with the given configuration.

Parameters:

  • query – The user query.

  • config – Configuration dictionary (strategies, models, etc.).

Returns:

Result dictionary with answer and sources.

src.mcp.tools.pipeline_tools.get_pipeline_strategies() → List[str][source]

Returns available pipeline strategies.

Validates a pipeline configuration.

Parameters:

config – The configuration to validate.

Returns:

Validation result (valid/invalid, errors).

src.mcp.tools.reranking_tools module

src.mcp.tools.reranking_tools.calculate_relevance_score(query: str, document: str) → float[source]

Calculates the relevance score between a query and a document.

Parameters:

  • query – The search query.

  • document – The document text.

Returns:

A float score between 0.0 and 1.0.

src.mcp.tools.reranking_tools.get_reranking_models() → List[str][source]

Returns available reranking models.

src.mcp.tools.reranking_tools.rerank_results(query: str, results: List[Dict[str, Any]], strategy: str = 'cross-encoder') → List[Dict[str, Any]][source]

Reranks the given results based on the query.

Parameters:

  • query – The search query.

  • results – List of document results to rerank.

  • strategy – Reranking strategy to use.

Returns:

Reranked list of documents.

src.mcp.tools.search_tools module

src.mcp.tools.search_tools.generate_embeddings(text: str, language: str = 'en') → Dict[str, Any][source]

Generates embeddings for the given text.

Parameters:

  • text – The input text.

  • language – The language of the text.

Returns:

A dictionary containing the embedding vector and model info.

src.mcp.tools.search_tools.get_search_strategies() → List[str][source]

Returns available search strategies.

src.mcp.tools.search_tools.hybrid_search(query: str, bm25_weight: float = 0.5) → List[Dict[str, Any]][source]

Performs hybrid search (Semantic + BM25).

Parameters:

  • query – The search query.

  • bm25_weight – Weight for BM25 score (0.0 to 1.0).

Returns:

A list of ranked documents.

src.mcp.tools.search_tools.search_documents(embedding: List[float], language: str, top_k: int = 5) → List[Dict[str, Any]][source]

Searches for documents using the given embedding.

Parameters:

  • embedding – The query embedding vector.

  • language – The language to search in.

  • top_k – Number of results to return.

Returns:

A list of matching documents.
